alert.note: Alert for Lake Of The Woods; Roseau (Minnesota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Eastern ND and Grand Forks (Northeastern North Dakota and Northwestern Minnesota)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 10 at 10:59PM CDT by NWS Eastern ND and Grand Forks
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northern Roseau and west central Lake of the Woods Counties through MIDNIGHT CDT... At 1058 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 11 miles northeast of Caribou, or 26 miles northwest of Roseau, moving east at 35 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. This strong thunderstorm will be near... Pinecreek around 1125 PM CDT. Ross around 1130 PM CDT. Roseau around 1145 PM CDT. Salol around 1155 PM CDT. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
